topic.title: ANNEX 23 – DOD WAIVERS OF THE CONTRACTOR EMPLOYEE COMPENSATION CAP

body.p: In accordance with NMCARS 5231.205-91, prepare the report for DOD Waivers of the Contractor Employee Compensation Cap using the directions in this annex unless DPC provides an updated format or direction.
If no waivers were granted by the activity, submit the following statement in email text using the submission directions in NMCARS 5231.205-91.
“No waivers to section 702 of the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2013 (BBA) were granted by the agency during FY 20XX”.
If one or more waivers were granted, use the following table format in Microsoft Word to respond to the reporting requirement.

p.b: Department of the Navy Contractor Employee Compensation Cap Waiver Reporting Template
